title: Virginia Tech travels to Furman on Tuesday night - VT hokiesports.com
content: Virginia Tech travels to Furman on Tuesday night  VT hokiesports.com
description: BLACKSBURG -- The Virginia Tech lacrosse team (6-3, 2-1) will travel to Paladin Stadium to take on Furman (0-2, 0-0) Tuesday, March 15 at 6 p.m. The game will be shown on ESPN+.
